commonSettings_addColumnAwp.message: Add column 'AWP Diff' to see the current AWP values.

commonSettings_addColumnAwpDiff.message: Add column 'AWP Diff' to see the missing AWPs to next expected player strength.

commonSettings_addColumnNextStrength.message: Add column 'Next Strength' to the see the next expected player strength. If activated column 'AWP Diff' shows the missing AWPs to that strength.

commonSettings_extendColumnStrength.message: Extend column 'Strength' with actual strength value.

commonSettings_extendColumn_transferPric.message:
Add column 'Transfer price (current age / current strength)'. Display average transfer prices based on imported transfers: current age, current strength.
Requires activated feature 'Import player transfers'.

Add column 'Transfer price (current age / next strength)'. Display average transfer prices based on imported transfers: current age, next strength.
Requires activated feature 'Import player transfers'.

Add column 'Transfer price (next age / current strength)'. Display average transfer prices based on imported transfers: next age, current strength.
Requires activated feature 'Import player transfers'.

Add column 'Transfer price (next age / next strength)'. Display average transfer prices based on imported transfers: next age, next strength.
Requires activated feature 'Import player transfers'.
